description: Variation of Conditions 1 and 6 of planning permission dated 11th September 2020 (RN: 19/06794/FULL) for, 'Demolition behind the retained New Bond Street facade and erection of a new building comprising sub-basement, basement, ground and six upper storeys for use as retail (Class A1) at basement, part ground and mezzanine floors; offices (Class B1) at part ground, third to sixth floors; and dual/alternative use of the first and second floor as either offices (Class B1) and/or retail (Class A1). Office access to be via Haunch of Venison Yard. Installation of plant at sub-basement and sixth floor levels, terraces at third to fifth floor levels and cycle storage and waste stores at sub-basement level'; NAMELY, to make the following amendments to the approved development - alterations to the approved basement level to create additional floorspace and reconfiguration of basement and lower ground level to accommodate sprinkler tanks, plant and pump requirements, substation relocation and sufficient end of trip facilities, alterations to approved floorplans to accommodate dedicated means of escape from the office and retail floorspace and updated plant and risers to align with updated fire strategy, alterations to the proposed rear elevation (facing onto Haunch of Venison Yard) to accommodate ventilation for relocated substation, alterations to the proposed ground floor shop front (facing onto New Bond Street) to create a single retail unit and updated drawing number in waste storage condition (Condition 6). (Application under Section 73).
